meanings.definition: The act or process of making something better.
meanings.sent1: The betterment of the school playground brought smiles to the children's faces.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated herself to the betterment of her community through volunteer work.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best garden was fierce, but the betterment of the winning garden was undeniable.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the betterment of his skills turned him into a master craftsman.
meanings.sent5: The betterment of the recipe with a secret ingredient made it a family favorite.

meanings.sent1: The betterment of the city park made it a popular spot for families to gather.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise is essential for the betterment of one's health.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to have a touch of magic for the betterment of his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The betterment of her mood was evident after a relaxing day at the spa.
meanings.sent5: The betterment of technology has revolutionized the way we communicate.
